author: nspiegelberg
msg: HBase shell can pre-split a new table at creation
This change adds optional arguments to the HBase shell's create command
to split a table into a specified number of regions using a specified
splitting algorithm as defined by RegionSplitter.
Created tables with and without splits using the shell; also attempted
to give incorrect arguments to shell create command.

author: nspiegelberg

ProcessServerShutDownOperation back to the todo queue, it should put back to the
Tested in titan migrate001 cluster and kill 10 region servers at one time. The

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Let the HFile Pretty Printer print all the key values for a specific row.
HBase-4698 Let the HFile Pretty Printer print all the key values for a specific
When using HFile Pretty Printer to debug HBase issues,
it would very nice to allow the Pretty Printer to seek to a specific row, and
only print all the key values for this row.
Test Plan: tested in the dev cluster and running all the unit tests

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Tab completion is helpful for debugging scripts.  I am not 100% sure what this
option actually does, but without it tab-completion frequently crashes and
requests this option to be present.  Error/crash message:
If there is a reason we shouldn't do this, I won't be offended.  But I find it
could pipe in commands and invoke shell as usual, and tab-completion now works.
Reviewers: kannan, kranganathan, dhruba, jgray, nspiegelberg
CC: hbase-eng@lists, hbase-ops@lists, nspiegelberg, rthiessen, dhruba
